snippet: Amid a sore lack of data, one federal office is conducting randomized trials of various educational programs to determine which live up to their claims.
abstract: Institute of Education Sciences, little-known office in federal Education Department, is conducting randomized clinical trials of various science and math education programs to determine which are effective; researchers say that findings could be transformative for schools and students across nation.
lead_paragraph: Amid a sore lack of data, one federal office is conducting randomized trials of various educational programs to determine which live up to their claims.

headline.main: Guesses and Hype Give Way to Data in Study of Education
